24cd0fea-451b-48fb-9a39-cb98b387248c.name: Fit
24cd0fea-451b-48fb-9a39-cb98b387248c.notes: Recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

features.situation: to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, or resist poison

08cf48db-fb50-4ba0-ae04-04be301705ec.name: Luck
08cf48db-fb50-4ba0-ae04-04be301705ec.notes: Usable once per hour of play

features.situation: to rolls for any lengthy mental task you concentrate on to the exclusion of other activities, if the GM feels such focus would be beneficial
to all rolls to notice interruptions while obsessed with a task

b09dae50-6904-4178-8fad-a060d03971fa.name: Very Fit
b09dae50-6904-4178-8fad-a060d03971fa.notes: Recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

features.situation: to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison

3650137f-5245-4c96-98f6-dc57be07dd5e.name: Acrophobia (Heights)
3650137f-5245-4c96-98f6-dc57be07dd5e.notes: You may not voluntarily go more than 15 feet above ground, unless you are inside a building and away from windows. If there is some chance of an actual fall, self-control rolls are at -5.

51a830af-8b7d-4e43-ba7b-de311c92bc4a.name: Agoraphobia (Open Spaces)
51a830af-8b7d-4e43-ba7b-de311c92bc4a.notes: You are uncomfortable whenever you are outside, and actually become frightened when there are no walls within 50 feet.

f75af829-a89c-4a7e-a445-6737e5fcb01a.name: Aichmophobia/TL5- (Sharp Things)
f75af829-a89c-4a7e-a445-6737e5fcb01a.notes: You are afraid of anything pointed. Swords, spears, knives, and needles all give you fits. Trying to use a sharp weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

bbe9ca97-ffc7-44f2-8d83-9974921dae90.name: Aichmophobia/TL6+ (Sharp Things)
bbe9ca97-ffc7-44f2-8d83-9974921dae90.notes: You are afraid of anything pointed. Swords, spears, knives, and needles all give you fits. Trying to use a sharp weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

dee24536-d679-45f8-ad6a-36a224e3d68e.name: Ailurophobia (Cats)
dee24536-d679-45f8-ad6a-36a224e3d68e.notes: This includes all felines: lions, tigers, panthers, etc.

1da5df1a-416b-408e-9cfd-38791ca84ec7.name: Autophobia (Being Alone)
1da5df1a-416b-408e-9cfd-38791ca84ec7.notes: You cannot stand to be alone, and do anything in your power to avoid it.

c8f1df31-d865-4a07-8976-29be834f86b8.name: Brontophobia (Loud Noises)
c8f1df31-d865-4a07-8976-29be834f86b8.notes: You avoid any situation where loud noises are likely. A sudden loud noise requires an immediate self-control roll. A thunderstorm is a traumatic experience for you!

c33e33d0-bc4a-4c93-8b97-37f3b1d66721.name: Claustrophobia (Enclosed Spaces)
c33e33d0-bc4a-4c93-8b97-37f3b1d66721.notes: You are uncomfortable any time you can’t see the sky – or at least a very high ceiling. In a small room or vehicle, you feel the walls closing in on you... You need air! This is a dangerous fear for someone who plans to go underground.

5706417f-9379-44cb-a8c5-7227d70439a5.name: Coitophobia (Sex)
5706417f-9379-44cb-a8c5-7227d70439a5.notes: You are terrified by the idea of sexual relations or the loss of your virginity.

b7d9d93d-d2c5-415e-8783-4b05b001c592.name: Cynophobia (Dogs)
b7d9d93d-d2c5-415e-8783-4b05b001c592.notes: This includes all canines: foxes, wolves, coyotes, wild dogs, etc.

e221a86a-9124-4863-b6a2-67cc59b0464e.name: Demophobia (Crowds)
e221a86a-9124-4863-b6a2-67cc59b0464e.notes: Any group of over a dozen people sets off this fear unless they are all well known to you. The self-control roll is at -1 for over 25 people, -2 for a crowd of 100 or more, -3 for 1,000, -4 for 10,000, and so on.

69ccbd91-95c5-4b43-8c01-87554c1083b3.name: Entomophobia (Insects)
69ccbd91-95c5-4b43-8c01-87554c1083b3.notes: You are afraid of all “bugs.” Large or poisonous ones give -3 to self-control rolls. Very large ones, or large numbers, give -6. Avoid hills of giant ants.

54187f2e-147d-4c89-8fc2-70c769cc0a09.name: Greed
54187f2e-147d-4c89-8fc2-70c769cc0a09.notes: Make a self-control roll any time riches are offered – as payment for fair work, gains from adventure, spoils of crime, or just bait. If you fail, you do whatever it takes to get the payoff.

fb4bddd8-9138-4843-9bfa-1f13768b5b85.name: Hemophobia (Blood)
fb4bddd8-9138-4843-9bfa-1f13768b5b85.notes: The sight of blood gives you the screaming willies! You need to make a self-control roll during most combats...

b6268068-a23f-4ef6-997f-f438b7f6f5c9.name: Herpetophobia (Reptiles)
b6268068-a23f-4ef6-997f-f438b7f6f5c9.notes: You come unglued at the thought of reptiles, amphibians, and similar scaly slimies. A very large reptile, or a poisonous one, gives -2 to self-control rolls; a horde of reptiles (such as a snake pit) gives -4.

4b250745-2f8a-448f-af3d-d90ace8faf35.name: Honesty
4b250745-2f8a-448f-af3d-d90ace8faf35.notes: Make a self-control roll when faced with the “need” to break unreasonable laws; if you fail, you must obey the law, whatever the consequences. If you manage to resist your urges and break the law, make a second self-control roll afterward. If you fail, you must turn yourself in to the authorities!

673c5268-a7fe-46b3-bb89-3ef65887ff22.name: Hoplophobia (Weapons)
673c5268-a7fe-46b3-bb89-3ef65887ff22.notes: The presence of any sort of weaponry is stressful. Trying to use a weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

features.situation: from victims of your intolerance (may be as much as -5, at GM's discretion)

105f7828-73c6-4502-89fa-7a20289dbe7d.name: Loner
105f7828-73c6-4502-89fa-7a20289dbe7d.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever anyone lingers nearby, watches over your shoulder, etc. If you fail, you lash out at that person just as if you had Bad Temper.

6f43e871-f742-46d4-82d6-08385d52bde2.name: Manaphobia (Magic)
6f43e871-f742-46d4-82d6-08385d52bde2.notes: You can never learn to use magic, and you react badly to any user of magic. Make a self-control roll whenever you are in the presence of magic. This roll is at -3 if you are to be the target of friendly magic, and -6 if you are the target of hostile magic. (The magic does not have to be real, if you believe in it!)

5707f046-ce90-47a7-9dbd-c9ed65529fc4.name: Mild Shyness
5707f046-ce90-47a7-9dbd-c9ed65529fc4.notes: You are uneasy with strangers, especially assertive or attractive ones.

88f9d38c-d19e-4412-98fc-4a66011fcce1.name: Miserliness
88f9d38c-d19e-4412-98fc-4a66011fcce1.notes: Make a self-control roll any time you are called on to spend money. If the expenditure is large, this roll may be at -5 or worse (GM’s decision). If you fail, you refuse to spend the money.

51ecc6f4-f2b8-41de-bfb9-067770dd364e.name: Mysophobia (Dirt)
51ecc6f4-f2b8-41de-bfb9-067770dd364e.notes: You are deathly afraid of infection, or just of dirt and filth. Make a self-control roll when you must do something that might get you dirty. Roll at -5 to eat any unaccustomed food. You should act as “finicky” as possible.

1e6861e1-9f50-4bf8-a981-0f44eac7281d.name: Necrophobia (Death)
1e6861e1-9f50-4bf8-a981-0f44eac7281d.notes: You are terrified by the idea of death. Make a self-control roll in the presence of any dead body (animals don’t count, but portions of human bodies do). Roll at -4 if the body is that of someone you know, or -6 if the body is unnaturally animated in some way. A ghost (or apparent ghost) also requires a roll at -6.

features.situation: from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident
to resist Influence skills: Diplomacy, Fast-Talk, Intimidation, Savoir-Faire, Sex Appeal, and Streetwise

f24f5169-483e-45de-b55f-ca802c8d2665.name: Overconfidence
f24f5169-483e-45de-b55f-ca802c8d2665.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are

7d8f7b91-de3c-40d9-8d59-fe9f875bd837.name: Pyrophobia (Fire)
7d8f7b91-de3c-40d9-8d59-fe9f875bd837.notes: Even a burning cigarette bothers you if it comes within five yards.

f30feaba-b74a-4691-abdf-e5caac2c1ee4.name: People Affected
f30feaba-b74a-4691-abdf-e5caac2c1ee4.notes: Almost everyone except @large class of people@

9881cb52-0596-4e15-bb38-1b1d02cd1f1e.name: Scotophobia (Darkness)
9881cb52-0596-4e15-bb38-1b1d02cd1f1e.notes: A common fear, but crippling. You should avoid being underground if possible; if something happens to your flashlight or torch, you might well lose your mind before you can relight it.

f6640274-1434-43c9-98c4-d94dca582f6b.name: Severe Shyness
f6640274-1434-43c9-98c4-d94dca582f6b.notes: You are very uncomfortable around strangers, and tend to be quiet even among friends.

f4ea91ea-63c0-42e4-834f-aba810901c40.name: Teratophobia (Monsters)
f4ea91ea-63c0-42e4-834f-aba810901c40.notes: Any “unnatural” creature sets off this fear. You have -1 to -4 on the self-control roll if the monster seems very large or dangerous, or if there are a lot of them. Note that the definition of “monster” depends on experience. An American Indian would consider an elephant monstrous, while an African pygmy would not!

d6622d21-be83-4f34-87c5-1ecc030412cd.name: Thalassophobia (Oceans)
d6622d21-be83-4f34-87c5-1ecc030412cd.notes: You are afraid of any large body of water. Ocean travel, or even air travel over the ocean, is basically impossible for you, and encounters with aquatic monsters are also upsetting.

769f513f-05a4-4aa5-a263-eb176b8b7f45.name: Triskaidekaphobia (Number 13)
769f513f-05a4-4aa5-a263-eb176b8b7f45.notes: You must make a self-control roll whenever you have to deal with the number 13. Roll at -5 if Friday the 13th is involved!

8f5575cb-3673-48b5-b7c5-5898d31fd508.name: Unluckiness
8f5575cb-3673-48b5-b7c5-5898d31fd508.notes: Once per play session, the GM will arbitrarily and maliciously make something go wrong for you.

62a2fcb9-16fa-4f5b-bfcb-47db4ff84a1e.name: Xenophobia (Strange and Unknown Things)
62a2fcb9-16fa-4f5b-bfcb-47db4ff84a1e.notes: You are upset by any sort of strange circumstances, and in particular by strange people. Make a self-control roll when surrounded by people of another race or nationality; roll at -3 if the people are not human. If you lose control, you might well attack strangers out of fear.

2a49944d-19a5-4060-8522-8328c57b6428.name: 2 extra points in primary or secondary skills
